newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austrian Natbank allots 5.42 bln ATS in repos.
newsitem.headline: Austrian Natbank allots 5.42 bln ATS in repos.

text.p: The Austrian National Bank said on Friday it had allocated 5.42 billion schillings in one-week securities repurchase agreements at a fixed 3.2 percent.
On Thursday the central bank cut its repo rate by 20 basis points to 3.0 percent, effective September 2.
The central bank said seven percent of bids were filled.
Last week, the bank allocated 10.98 billion schillings, or 14 percent of bids, in repos at 3.2 percent. -- Janet McBride, Vienna Newsroom, 43-1-53112-258
